flawed_nl_solution:
40% of the class is boys because 100-60=<<100-60=60>>60
There are 10 boys because 25x0.4=<<25*0.4=10>>10
60% of the boys don't like playing basketball because 100-40=<<100-40=60>>60
6 boys don't like playing basketball because 10x0.6=6
12 girls like playing basketball because 6x2=<<6*2=12>>12
There are 15 girls in the class because 25-10=<<25-10=15>>15
80% of the girls in class like playing basketball because 12/15=<<12/15=0.8>>0.8
#### 80

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
